attributes.action: Sack Jacob Rees-Mogg for discrediting Dr. David Nicholl
attributes.additional_details:
Dr Nicholl was one of the authors of the Yellowhammer document warning of what will happen to some very ill patients if there's a no-deal Brexit..

://www.mirror.co.uk/news/politics/jacob-rees-mogg-compares-author-19568850
attributes.background: Jacob Rees Mogg has used Parliamentary Privilege to discredit and slander Consultant Neurologist Dr. David Nicholl, likening him to discredited anti-vaxx Dr Andrew Wakefield.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments. This includes calling for MPs and Ministers being sacked.
